name: view-prototype.toml

useCase.name: View Prototype
useCase.soThat: I can see a working demo of the application

rawContent:
# View Prototype

[useCase]
id = "uc_view_prototype"
name = "View Prototype"
asRole = "visitor"
iWant = "view the React prototype"
soThat = "I can see a working demo of the application"

[useCase.meta]
isActive = true
priority = 2

[useCase.conditions]
pre = [
  "Prototype is built and available",
  "Mock data files exist"
]
post = [
  "User has viewed prototype",
  "Prototype is functional"
]

# Relations - keys match folder names in layers/
[relations]
roles = ["visitor", "user"]
guards = ["public"]
pages = ["users", "products"]

[implementation]
route = "/prototype"
pages = ["users", "products"]
preview = "/prototype"
status = "implemented"

# Flow diagram
[[flow]]
id = "navigate"
type = "start"
label = "User navigates to /prototype"

[[flow]]
id = "serve"
type = "action"
label = "Server serves React app"

[[flow]]
id = "load_mocks"
type = "action"
label = "Load mock JSON data"

[[flow]]
id = "interact"
type = "action"
label = "User interacts with screens"

[[flow]]
id = "complete"
type = "end"
label = "Prototype displays data"
